name: Life of A Commenter
description:
Introduction

Different troll comments are lurking beneath the depths of the internet. Legends says that there is one man.  One man that can top them all. The greatest.. troll.. of every comment section.

Comments are taken from real life and is not intended to insult or offend people or group of people.

'Life of a Commenter' is originally created for the All you do is click click click jam. A game jam focused on clicker games. Check out other submissions by clicking here.

Whats New?

  • Auto save and load function
  • Item Shop
  • Added more dank comments
  • Tweaked Video Titles
  • Visual tweaks and bug fixes
Controls

Spam keyboard or tap the keyboard on screen.

Credits

Big thanks to http://www.freesfx.co.uk for the cool sound effects.
